pr_title: [FLINK-17586][python] Use the real StreamExecutionEnvironment contained in DummyStreamExecutionEnvironment when translating the Python UDF physical nodes to operators.

timeline.message: [FLINK-17586][python] get the real Configuration object from DummyStreamExecutionEnvironment when translating the Python UDF physical nodes to operators.

timeline.bodyText: Should we also consider the DummyExecutionEnvironment?
timeline.author: dianfu

replies.bodyText: Currently it is unnecessary as the DummyExecutionEnvironment would not be passed to the translateToPlan methods.
replies.author: WeiZhong94
